86.eng-name: Limits and Punishments set by Allah (Hudood)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdur-Rahman bin Jabir:On the authority of others, that the Prophet (ﷺ) said, "No Punishment exceeds the flogging of the ten stripes, except if one is guilty of a crime necessitating a legal punishment prescribed by Allah

chapter.eng-name: What punishment may be inflicted on the person so that they may not commit the same sin again, or so that they may learn good manners
